name: README Generator
description: A Node application that can take user input and generate a formatted README file

name: Team Profile Generator
description: A simple command-line application that generates profiles for your work team.

name: Rhyme Radar
description: RhymeRadar is a user-friendly and innovative application designed to enhance your music discovery experience. With a vast database of lyrics spanning across genres and artists

name: Analogue Clock
description: A Clock built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a dynamic and interactive web-based timepiece. Using modern web technologies, it accurately displays the current time, updating in real-time.

name: Weater Dashboard
description: A Weather Dashboard is a user-friendly interface that provides real-time weather information and forecasts for specific locations. It displays current weather conditions, such as temperature, humidity and wind speed.

name: JS Quiz
description: JavaScript Multiple Choice Quiz: Test your knowledge with this interactive quiz! Answer a series of questions covering various JavaScript concepts and features. Choose the correct option from multiple choices and see how well you score!
